titles: To the most honorable assembly of the Commons House of Parliament the binders of bookes in London doe most humblie shew ...
author: Bookbinders of London.
notes: Petition against the monopoly of the Company of Goldbeaters for importation and sale of gold leaf.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Gold industry --  Law and legislation --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
